hooks.command: input=$(cat); file=$(echo "$input" | grep -oE '"file_path"\s*:\s*"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/.*"file_path"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"//;s/"$//'); case "$file" in */go.mod|go.mod) go mod tidy 2>&1 | tail -10;; *) exit 0;; esac

input=$(cat); file=$(echo "$input" | grep -oE '"file_path"\s*:\s*"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/.*"file_path"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"//;s/"$//'); case "$file" in *.secret.env|*.env.local) echo "BLOCKED: Editing $file is not allowed" >&2; exit 2;; *) exit 0;; esac

input=$(cat); file=$(echo "$input" | grep -oE '"file_path"\s*:\s*"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/.*"file_path"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"//;s/"$//'); case "$file" in */go.sum|go.sum) echo "BLOCKED: go.sum should only be modified by 'go mod tidy'" >&2; exit 2;; *) exit 0;; esac
